name: Project Ball
description:
Project Ball

Project Ball is a small prototype of a puzzle game, the idea behind it is that the player can control the gravity of the entire level which can make it into interesting puzzles.

At this current stage, the game is in a prototype stage which I'm testing features and ideas to add or remove, feel free to suggest ideas as well :).

----------

Support: Works on PC (planning to make it a mobile game as well)
Controls: A-D to tilt the screen, or the <-- , --> (Left, Right Keyboard arrows).

This Project is in prototype stage.
